workspace.setting_mic_test_description: Are you having a trouble with your mic? Let's find out by saying any words out loud and we will play back to you.
workspace.setting_record_interval_tooltip:
When you create local recording files for a long time, your PC may experience a heavy load.
We recommed you to set recording time intervals.
workspace.setting_record_resolution_tooltip:
When setting the resolution of 720p (HD) or higher,
please be aware that the service depends on the PC's performance.
workspace.access_deny_description:
Click icon on browser address field
to allow access and refresh the page.
workspace.remote_name_valid1: Type in more than 2 letters for Collabo name.
workspace.remote_name_valid2: Please don't add special letters for Collabo name.

workspace.create_select_empty_title: There is no member available for Collabo.
workspace.create_select_empty_description: Add a member to invite to your Collabo.
workspace.record_description1: The completed local recorded file belongs to the system of your PC.
workspace.record_description2: Refer the browser settings for download location when downloading [Download].
workspace.record_description3: If you perform local recording in incognito mode, your recording file gets deleted when you close the browser.
workspace.license_expire_title:
Your plans are all expired
to use VIRNECT Remote 2.0.
workspace.license_expire_description:
If you want to use Remote 2.0,
please add/update plans from your workstation.
workspace.license_no_title:
No available plan
to use VIRNECT Remote 2.0.
workspace.license_no_description:
There is no Workspace to use the VIRNECT Remote 2.0.
Please ask your Master for plans.
workspace.plan_exceeded: Notice of excess use of plans
workspace.plan_exceeded_desctiption: The service is restricted because there were more users assigned to the plans than the number of plans you possess. Please request for plan management to the Master user.
workspace.cookie:
VIRNECT uses cookies to operate VIRNECT's services and improve customer experience. For more information,
check out our cookie policy. By clicking ‘OK’ or continuing to use the site, you agree to these cookie settings.
